actions.description: The chitine makes three Dagger attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 4 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dagger

specialTraits.description: The chitine has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the chitine to sleep.
specialTraits.name: Fey Ancestry

specialTraits.description: While in sunlight, the chitine has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Sensitivity

specialTraits.description: While in contact with a web, the chitine knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
specialTraits.name: Web Sense

specialTraits.description: The chitine ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.
specialTraits.name: Web Walker
